data.message: I seriously could give two fucks for Trump but honestly to pay his ass attention as much as everyone has you might as well just shove his dick in your mouths because that's all that comes out it. I'm not looking for responses because if you respond negatively then you honestly have a extra chromosome and don't get what I'm saying. The fact is you're whining about shit you don't control. So you're just whining. Put a tampon in please and a gag while you're at it or just live your lives
